content: शालिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) (usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Endowed with, possessed of, possessing, shining or resplendent with; अलघूपलपक्तिंशालिनी <ls>Śi. 16. 76</ls>, <ls>Ki. 2. 31</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">7. 28</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 7.">55</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">8. 17</ls>, <ls>Rs. 4. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Domestic.
